articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Chase Chapman
"we are a DAO"
- boring
- heard it before
- tells you nothing
"we are an ever-evolving internet organization"
- arouses curiosity
- forces debates about 'what is DAO'
- makes you wonder how ppl pay their bills

Design feels unreal. Can’t imagine the amount of work that went into this. 👏🫡

Here is our humble contribution to the web3 education landscape. 🧵
